message.content:
cs.LG, cs.SI, cs.SY, cs.AI, cs.NI 

The paper focuses on developing a Quality-Cost-Aware Online Task Allocation (QCO-TA) scheme using a principled online reinforcement learning framework to address the challenges in multi-attribute social sensing applications. This involves optimizing the tradeoff between data quality and sensing cost, which is a problem that falls under the categories of machine learning (cs.LG), social and information networks (cs.SI), control systems (cs.SY), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), and networking and internet architecture (cs.NI).
